meanings.definition: To have or experience a fever.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside in the sun all day, she was fevering and needed to rest.
meanings.sent2: The child was fevering and had to stay home from school.
meanings.sent3: Even the thermometer was surprised to see how high she was fevering.
meanings.sent4: The heat of the desert sun was fevering her skin like a relentless flame.
meanings.sent5: Her body was fevering with such intensity that it felt like a wildfire burning within.

meanings.definition: To be in a state of excitement or agitation.
meanings.sent1: The fans were fevering with anticipation before the big game.
meanings.sent2: She was fevering with excitement when she received the good news.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was fevering with joy when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The city was fevering with activity during the holiday season.
meanings.sent5: His mind was fevering with ideas for the upcoming project.
